senses.sense_definition: Impossible to treat, cure, or remedy, often referring to a medical condition or disease.

examples.text: The doctor explained that the rare virus was currently <w>untreatable</w> with standard medicine.
Although the condition is <w>untreatable</w>, medication can help manage the symptoms effectively.

senses.sense_definition: A person suffering from a medical condition that cannot be cured or managed.

examples.text: The old hospital wing was once reserved for the <w>untreatables</w> who required palliative care.
Society must ensure that even the so-called <w>untreatables</w> receive dignity and comfort.
